trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Attleboro
There were no other sightings in Attleboro on or around November 30th 2007
Summary: TRAVELED NORTH TO SOUTH AND WENT DIRECTLY OVERHEAD
divs: Sighting DetailsI LIVE ON THE THIRD FLOOR AND HAVE A PORCH WITH NO ROOF.I DECIDED TO GO OUT AND HAVE A CIGARETTE AND LOOK AT THE STARS WHICH WERE NICE AND BRIGHT SEEING HOW A COLD FRONT HAD PASSED BY EARLIER.I WAS LOOKING UP TOWARDS THE NORTHEAST WHEN I SAW TO THE NORTH WHAT I THOUGHT WAS GOING TO BE AN ADVERTISMENT SEARCHLIGHT , BUT THE LIT UP AREA CONTINUED TO COME STRAIGHT TOWARDS ME AND FLEW DIRECTLY OVER ME AND CONTINUED TO THE SOUTH TOWARDS GREEN AIRPORT IN RHODE ISLAND.AS IT PASSED OVERHEAD THERE WAS NO NOISE WHAT SO EVER AND IT CONTINUED IN A STRAIGHT PROJECTORY.AS IT WHENT OVERHEAD I COULD MAKE OUT ALL THE DETAILS OF ITS SHAPE.IT WAS A BOOMERANG SHAPE WITH SIX LARGE ROUND GLOWING RED LIGHTED AREAS,THREE UNDER EACH WING WHICH WERE ALMOST THE SIZE OF A FULL MOON.ON THE BACK SIDE OF THE RED AREAS WHICH WERE EVENLY SPACED ON THE WINGS THERE WAS A PURPLISH HAZE AND THE WHOLE BODY OF THE CRAFT? SEEMED TO BE A VERY LIGHT VIOLET COLOR.IT SEEMED SO STEALTH LIKE.I WANT TO SAY IT WAS LIKE A WELL DEFINED MIRAGE OR HOLOGRAPH OR KIND OF CLOAKED A LITTLE BUT YET I COULD MAKE OUT ALL THE FEATURES OF IT,WHICH THERE WAS NOT MANY OF TO SEE.I WAS AMAZED BY ITS BEAUTY ALMOST AWED BY IT.I FELT ASTONISHED.I DID NOT FEEL LIKE I HAD BEEN OBSERVED BY IT.AS IT PASSED OVERHEAD AND TOWARDS RHODE ISLAND IT WENT BEYOND MY VIEW.
